checkStatus.comment: the minimal content of the object to be provided by the IServicable to check if a service is up and running

startable.comment: whether the service is startable without any other intervention

reasons.comment: if the service is running, then list of the detected errors, must be empty if startable

pids.comment: list of pids which must been checked to be alive, must be empty if startable

port.comment: list of TCP ports which must been checked to be pingable, must be empty if startable
